tweet: BPO's are used by the bank to help determine the present value of a home.
BPO's save banks tons of money, hiring an appraiser can be $400 to $600.
Some banks use BPO's to determine whether they want to foreclose on a property.
BPO's are most often used when a bank is trying to expedite a short sale and they need to find out if the offer is close to the value.
BPO's can pay up to $200 a piece to the agent that performs them.
